import React from 'react' import Nav from '../Nav.js' function Newarrivals() { return (

NEW ARRIVALS

{/* Conditional rendering */} {visibleBooks.map((newbook, index) => (

{newbook.name}

{newbook.id}

{newbook.description}

{newbook.rating}

{newbook.price}

))}
) } export default Newarrivals
